titleStmt.title: XXXI. select sermons, preached on special occasions; the titles and several texts, on which they were preached, follow. / By William Strong, that godly, able and faithful minister of Christ, lately of the Abby at Westminster. None of them being before made publique.
titleStmt.author: Strong, William, d. 1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.W. for Francis Tyton, and are to be sold at his shop, at the sign of the three Daggers neer the Inner Temple gate.,

notesStmt.note: Thomason Tracts reel 132:E.875[1] begins with p. 465, "One heart, one way".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
